title: Lulu mid!
body: Hi all, so i play  {{champion:117}}  mid, im mastery 6 and i like to believe i main her. Now i usually do pretty well in lane, sometimes with a few ganks from our handy jg or sometimes alone however, since lulu is a relatively hard champ to play and her damage(ap) isnt incredibly high i just find it hard to "hard snowball" into late game. I mean i can be up to 4-5 kill ahead and maybe roam bot help them get a few kills or whatever, but i feel like i could be snowballing so much better/harder. Does anyone have any help for me? i'd really appreciate it! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: I play AD lulu when I roll her in ARAM. Got S grades last 2/3 times. Good fun.
thats true. Only her aa's do ad. so i think it'd be hard to lane with AD lulu..
